text: This is a fan-made generator for the Warrior Cats -book series by Erin Hunter.
You're welcome to use the characters and sprites generated in this program, as long as you don't claim the sprites as your own creations or sell them for any reason.
<i>(hover over a name to see their contributions!)
Thank you to the beta testers and all those who have helped with development.
Code is licensed under Mozilla Public License Version 2.0

contrib.anju:
-Senior Contributor-
Creating the Original Game- Old Base Code (Clan creation, Clan screen, Timeskip, Mates and kits, Starclan), Base Sprites & Pelts, Patrol Arts, New Sprite Revisions, Shaders
contrib.SableSteel:
-Senior Contributor-
Created original patrol code, events, and a lot of updates of the fan edit
contrib.Blackfur:
-Senior Contributor-
Initial macOS port, maintainer of Clangen-Web
contrib.Lixxis:
-Senior Contributor-
Relationships (Base Code + Rework) / Interactions / Group Events, Poly-mates, adoptive parents, enhanced inheritance system, Injuries and Illnesses (Base Code), Pregnancy 'System', general Game-Code structure, Freshkill System (WIP)
contrib.Ryos:
-Senior Contributor-
Lots of White Patches, Patrol Rework, Spritesheet Update (added paralyzed and sick sprites), Thought Rework, Misc Writing & Art Additions, Sprite Wrangler
contrib.scribble:
-Senior Contributor-
User Interface, Med Den, Herb System, Conditions System, Moon + Patrol Events, Camp Backgrounds + Other Art, History, Family Tree
contrib.keyraven (key): -Senior Contributor- UI migration to pygame_gui, Fading system, Mediator role, Mask-based tortie system, Singlestripe pelt, Some white patches/tortie patterns, Misc Code
contrib.Archanyhm: -Senior Contributor- Contributed Auto-Updater, Update-API, macOS fixes, changelog display
contrib.Clayteeth: Og short haired paralyzed sprites, accessories, new scars art+code, assistance with short haired paralyzed sprite v2, patrol art
contrib.sami(RAYTRAC3R): first implementation of biomes, gender system, and profile tabs, helped Ryos with tortie recode bugs
contrib.Shou: Build workflow rewrite, initial lint/test workflows, bug/performance/refactoring fixes
contrib.Tanukigami: Accessory Code and other Coding Contributions
contrib.Tybaxel: Patrol sprites, clan creation screen art
contrib.ZtheCorgi (Zabe): nylon & indigo collars, various small bugfixes and proofreading
contrib.Charlie: Cream color and Pale Ginger modifications
contrib.Owanora: collar rework (classic + bell) , UI design (help) and assets , Mitaine White, OG short paralysed sprite pelts, cat paw cursor (asset)
contrib.Silverstar: Camp backgrounds, black and brown pelts, paralyzed and sick sprites, numerous patrol art, more eyes, misc code, patrols, and thoughts.
contrib.beejeans: patrol sprites, classic, mackerel, and sokoke tabbies, various white patches
contrib.Kassi: Various patrol sprites, various tortoiseshell sprites
contrib.paradigox: Writing contributions: herb and warrior patrols, grief strings, typo fixer, Dyslexic Proofreader
contrib.Luna: Part of Auto-Updater, Settings menu rework, Discord rpc, Cat paw cursor, and Internal optimizations
contrib.Svmmoner: POWDER vitligo marking, ORIOLE tortie patchs, war moon events and various bug fixes
contrib.Perrio: Newborn sprites, Painted & Heart2 white patches, Sepiapoint+Minkpoint+Colorpoint
contrib.SunlitFable: Hunting and herb patrols, leader ceremony snippets, various typo and wording changes | 'PACMAN' and 'ROSETAIL' tortie patches, 'SAVANNAH' white patch
contrib.Hobohime: relationship event overhaul, writing contributions, editor, proof reader, MOON vit, half of PHANTOM vit, bug fixes
contrib.lividjesmar: Patrol art and various dead thoughts
contrib.izzyphobic: Various writing and art contributions, 'OWL' white patch
contrib.Ronfaure: Writing contributions, medicine cat patrols, misc moon events (Scandalous!)
contrib.chrnakry (Kry): User interface, bug fixes, cat names code, saves checker, backgrounds revamp, patrol fixes, various icons art, misc. code
contrib.Chrome: white patches, tortie masks, and names
contrib.Adamented: Writing: one patrol outcome & pronoun tagging uwu (for now)
